body.name: Codi Olive Lotion nourishing and rejuvenating HAND & BODY LOTION 3.3 oz - 3 TUBES
deliveryMessages: FREE delivery Wednesday, February 21 on orders shipped by Amazon over $35
features: EXTRA SKINCARE - Codi Olive oil hand and body lotion are prepared from organic ingredients; Its natural formula is great to make skin smooth, moist and fresh; it will be absorbed quickly and would penetrate deep into the skin to provide long lasting shield of moisture to keep skin smooth and fresh

ENHANCED SKIN TREATMENT - Codi olive hand lotion absorbs quickly and has a very mild and pleasant scent that does not linger; It keeps your skin fresh and moisturized; The presence of fat-soluble vitamins A, D, E and K provides extra treatment and nutrients for the skin

ANTIOXIDANT PROPERTIES - Codi olive body lotion come with natural antioxidant properties of olive; Its antioxidant feature helps prevent premature aging and keeps the wrinkles away from skin; Olive’s nature protects the skin from certain bacteria.

PERFECT GIFT IDEA - This is an ideal gift for those who are extra conscious about their skin; Even those who do not care much about the skin would love this great lotion; Buy this for your loved ones, and this lotion with olive scent and smooth texture would remind them of you every day; The attractive design of the bottle make it suitable for placing it anywhere in the house, and it will add to the beauty of the place

GUARANTEED SATISFACTION – We are one hundred percent sure that you would always like Codi’s nourishing olive formula; Your body would love the fresh and wonderful after feelings of this codi lotion; If you face any problem with our product, leave us a message and our representative will take care of everything; Don’t miss the opportunity, click ADD TO CART now
body.description: Intensive nourishing lotion for feet, hands and body. Our lotion will instantly make your skin feel smooth and hydrated while leave a pleasant aroma behind. . . Ingredients: Ingredients: Water, Propylene Glycol, Glycerin, Isopropyl Myristate, Cetearyl Alcohol, Microcrystalline Wax, PEG-40 Stearate, Sorbitan Stearate, Urea, Stearic Acid, Fragrance, Glyceryl Stearate, Carbomer, Methylparaben, Triethanolamine, Propylparaben, Olea Europaea (Olive) Fruit Oil, Disodium EDTA

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars If your hands are cracked & dry, you need this
reviews.reviewText: A friend let me use this lotion & she went on & on about it. After i used it, i understood why.Its a very moisturizing lotion but isnt thick. Leaves your hands feeling soft, not greasy like some lotions. The smell is light and very nice. The price is great too! I have the lavender 3 pack on order as well!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 7, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Really nice lotion, not greasy. Purchased for myself and liked it so well, I purchased more to use as Christmas gifts.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 7, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Was given product as a gift.
reviews.reviewText: Nice lotion, like the fragrance and feel.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I’ve bought this item many times. It’s very moisturizing and smells great.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best cream for hand!
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cream once in a store and couldn’t find it. This is the best professional hand cream. It moisturizes the skin very well and is not sticky. Kodi is one of the best companies that make good products. I'm glad I bought it again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 17, 2019
reviews.reviewText: It worked well. Smell was a little off for me that’s why I gave it only a 4 star.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 8, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I use it on my face. Smells soft and nice.I used all three that I bought. Will buy again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars The best for the price
reviews.reviewText: This is a very good lotion for dry skin and it is not greasy. Runs on smoothly and has minimal smell…. Been using for several years
